short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds quality of life features and extra personalisation to SoundCloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds additional features to Soundcloud such as:
-  "Follows you" icon to other users' pages.
-  Custom CSS code for your own page.
-  Clickable badges for members of groups or collectives.
-  More modern and natural layout for direct messages.
